entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
• I am a graduate student of Statistics in The George Washington University (GWU), currently finding summer research position in statistics, applied mathematics and related disciplines.
  • I am working on Partially Penalized Immersed Finite Element method for Elastodynamics interface problem with Dr. Xu Zhang.
  • I worked on Immersed Finite Element method for Elliptic interface problems with multi-domain and triple junction points, environmental flow dynamics and statistical analysis on sustainability in the past two years. Please see Research and CV for more information.
  • Homepage theme is stemmed from ‘The Legend of Zelda’, my favorite console game designed by Nintendo.
